name: The Golden Letters Early Demo v0.5
name_original: The Golden Letters Early Demo v0.5
description:
An Arabian warrior girl named Naya finds herself in the middle of the forest with no recollection of her past except for her name. She must journey to find out where she is, and the fate of the land in hopes of regaining her memory. Could the key be the sender of these mysterious golden missives?

Message from Kindaw:

Hello! And thanks for trying out the demo! Please note that since this project is going to be remade in Game Maker 1.4, it's possible that this demo will not be updated. Regardless, please feel free to leave a comment/review and let me know what you think so far! Links to the RPG Maker MV plugin makers that I used in this demo version are listed in the README file provided with the game. Enjoy! :D
